name: Comment Hierarchy Adjust
author: Andrew Norcross

sections.description: Adds a comment hierarchy to the edit comment screen to re-thread comments due to user error. Sometimes users reply to a comment, but don’t click the right button and leave it as a stand alone comment. This allows the site admin to go and re-thread that comment where it belongs.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload comment-hierarchy-adjust to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Navigate to a comment you want to adjust
  4. Change the parent as needed.
  5. Enjoy!
sections.faq:
What’s this all about?

Sometimes users reply to a comment, but don’t click the right button and leave it as a stand alone comment. This lets you fix that.
